data.text: Mɛma wo so, me Nyankopɔn, Ɔhenkɛse;
Da biara, mɛkamfo wo;
Awurade so, na ɔsɛ nkamfo kɛse;
Awo ntoatoaso baako bɛkamfo wo nnwuma akyerɛ afoforo;
Wɔbɛka wʼanuonyam ne wo tumi a ɛheran no ho asɛm,
Wɔbɛka wo nnwuma a ɛyɛ hu no mu tumi ho asɛm;
Wɔbɛhyɛ wo papayɛ mmoroso no ho fa,
Awurade yɛ ɔdomfo ne mmɔborɔhunufo;
Awurade ye ma obiara;
Awurade, wʼabɔde nyinaa bɛkamfo wo;
Wɔbɛka wʼahenni no anuonyam ho asɛm
sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a nnipa behu wo nnwuma akɛse
Wʼahenni yɛ daa ahenni,
Awurade wowaw wɔn a wɔhwe ase
Aniwa nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan,
Wubue wo nsam,
Awurade teɛ wɔ nʼakwan nyinaa mu;
Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinaa,
Ɔyɛ wɔn a wosuro no no apɛde ma wɔn;
Awurade hwɛ wɔn a wɔdɔ no no nyinaa so,
Mʼano bɛkamfo Awurade.
